definition: youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
profound theory (in Daoism and Buddhism)/mysterious principles
Xuanzang (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645
Xuanwu (Black tortoise) district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
deliberately mystifying/to make sth unnecessarily complicated
Tang Emperor Xuanzong (685-762), also known as Emperor Ming of Tang 唐明皇[Tang2 Ming2 huang2], reign name of seventh Tang emperor 李隆基[Li3 Long1 ji1], reigned 712-756
Wei and Jin philosophical school amalgamating Daoist and Confucian ideals/translation of metaphysics (also translated 形而上學|形而上学)
Fang Xuanling (579-648), Tang dynasty historian, compiler of History of Jin dynasty 晉書|晋书
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe

sentences.english: Life seemed a strained Yuen, the moment must not relax.
sentences.chinese: 生活仿佛一根紧绷的玄，一刻放松不得。

sentences.english: The Americans stayed here from June to September.
sentences.chinese: 那些好国人从六月到玄月皆呆正在那边。

sentences.english: The xuan President let enterprise separate kylin daredevil to go abroad.
sentences.chinese: 玄会长让振国分开麒麟艺高去留学。

sentences.english: I've a better question. Who is in the septic tank?
sentences.chinese: 我有个更玄的问题化粪池里是谁？

sentences.english: Chadha, K. , "A Reconfigurable Decoder Architecture for Wireless LAN and Cellular System, "2001.
sentences.chinese: 黄品玄，“可规划式威特比解码器之设计”2001。

sentences.english: One of the girls was named Xuan, who had the best grade in art subjects in the class.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个女孩叫玄，是我们班文科成绩最好的女生。

sentences.english: He was a favourite of the Emperor Xuanzong and became the official poet of the Imperial family.
sentences.chinese: 玄宗皇帝非常欣赏他，于是他成为了皇家的官方诗人。

definition: great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
Qingyang county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
